about_the_game:
Starfell is an immersive combo-building combat roguelike with a captivating astrology theme. Choose from 12 unique stargazer heroes, each with their own distinct abilities. Strategize and build your ultimate skill deck to conquer formidable bosses and overcome challenging enemies. Master the art of combining skills to create powerful combos and embark on a journey filled with strategic depth and celestial adventure. Are you ready to rise among the stars and claim victory?

Key Features:

  • Unique Stargazer Heroes: Select from 12 diverse heroes, each representing a constellation, with their own special skills and attributes. Whether you prefer the aggressive tactics of Aries or the supportive nature of Pisces, there’s a hero to match your playstyle.

  • Combo-Building Combat: Engage in dynamic battles where combining skills effectively can turn the tide of combat. Experiment with different skill combinations to discover devastating effects and powerful synergies.

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Explore ever-changing worlds filled with varied environments, enemies, and challenges. No two playthroughs are the same, offering endless replayability and fresh experiences every time you play.

  • Strategic Depth: Plan your moves carefully as you progress through the game. Balancing offense, defense, and support skills with blessings is key to overcoming the toughest foes and bosses.

  • Rich Astrology Theme: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world inspired by the stars. The game’s art, music, and lore are deeply rooted in astrology, adding a unique flavor to your adventure.

  • Challenging Enemies and Bosses: Face a wide range of enemies, each with their own tactics and weaknesses. Boss battles are epic encounters that will test your strategic thinking and skill execution.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Skill Deck Building: Collect and upgrade skills to build a powerful deck that complements your hero’s strengths. Customize your deck to suit different challenges and enemy types.

  • Resource Management: Manage resources wisely to maximize your effectiveness in battle. Knowing when to use your skills and when to conserve them can make all the difference.

  • Progression and Unlocks: Earn rewards as you progress, unlocking new heroes, skills, and upgrades. The more you play, the more content becomes available, allowing for deeper strategy and customization.

  • Endless Replayability: With procedurally generated levels, a variety of heroes and skills, and numerous strategic options, Starfell offers endless hours of engaging gameplay.
detailed_description:
Special Offer


About the Game

Starfell is an immersive combo-building combat roguelike with a captivating astrology theme. Choose from 12 unique stargazer heroes, each with their own distinct abilities. Strategize and build your ultimate skill deck to conquer formidable bosses and overcome challenging enemies. Master the art of combining skills to create powerful combos and embark on a journey filled with strategic depth and celestial adventure. Are you ready to rise among the stars and claim victory?

Key Features:

  • Unique Stargazer Heroes: Select from 12 diverse heroes, each representing a constellation, with their own special skills and attributes. Whether you prefer the aggressive tactics of Aries or the supportive nature of Pisces, there’s a hero to match your playstyle.

  • Combo-Building Combat: Engage in dynamic battles where combining skills effectively can turn the tide of combat. Experiment with different skill combinations to discover devastating effects and powerful synergies.

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Explore ever-changing worlds filled with varied environments, enemies, and challenges. No two playthroughs are the same, offering endless replayability and fresh experiences every time you play.

  • Strategic Depth: Plan your moves carefully as you progress through the game. Balancing offense, defense, and support skills with blessings is key to overcoming the toughest foes and bosses.

  • Rich Astrology Theme: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world inspired by the stars. The game’s art, music, and lore are deeply rooted in astrology, adding a unique flavor to your adventure.

  • Challenging Enemies and Bosses: Face a wide range of enemies, each with their own tactics and weaknesses. Boss battles are epic encounters that will test your strategic thinking and skill execution.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  • Skill Deck Building: Collect and upgrade skills to build a powerful deck that complements your hero’s strengths. Customize your deck to suit different challenges and enemy types.

  • Resource Management: Manage resources wisely to maximize your effectiveness in battle. Knowing when to use your skills and when to conserve them can make all the difference.

  • Progression and Unlocks: Earn rewards as you progress, unlocking new heroes, skills, and upgrades. The more you play, the more content becomes available, allowing for deeper strategy and customization.

  • Endless Replayability: With procedurally generated levels, a variety of heroes and skills, and numerous strategic options, Starfell offers endless hours of engaging gameplay.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Works for Apple Silicon (M1, M2, M3) & Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Starfell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G860
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Starfell is a combo-builder turn-based combat roguelike game with a unique astrology theme. Build your skill deck and defeat the boss with one of 12 distinct stargazer heroes. Strategize your best skill combos and prepare to face challenging and diverse enemies.
